headline: How Recent Data Security Partnerships Shape Equinix’s Value After 3% Weekly Rally
summary: If you’ve been eyeing Equinix and debating whether it deserves a spot in your portfolio, you’re not alone. This stock has been on a wild ride lately, and investors everywhere are weighing whether the recent momentum is a signal to buy in or just a temporary uptick. In the past week alone, Equinix shares rose 3.1%, adding to a nearly 6.2% gain over the last month. If you look at the bigger picture, the performance is more mixed: the stock is still down 11.1% for the year and 6.2% over the past...

headline: Fed Cleared For Descent
summary: U.S. stocks hit record highs as cooling inflation signals possible Fed rate cuts.
